mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_review (product_id, user_id, username, rating, content, images, is_anonymous, like_count) VALUES (#{productId}, #{userId}, #{username}, #{rating}, #{content}, #{images}, #{isAnonymous}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product_review WHERE product_id = #{productId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product_review WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE product_review SET like_count = like_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE product_review SET reply = #{reply}, reply_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT AVG(rating) FROM product_review WHERE product_id = #{productId}
SELECT rating, COUNT(*) as count FROM product_review WHERE product_id = #{productId} GROUP BY rating ORDER BY rating DESC
